name: Questions on the Film 'The Golden Bowl' Online Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'The Golden Bowl' is based on a novel by which author?
questions.explanation:
Henry James.

	Other James novels filmed in recent years include Wings of a Dove, Washington Square and Portrait of a Lady.

questions.text: The film is a Merchant-Ivory production; they used one of their favourite writers for the adaptation, who?
questions.explanation:
Ruth Prawer Jhabvala.

	Ruth Prawer Jhabvala was born to Polish parents and married into an Indian family, hence her unusual name. She is a successful novelist in her own right.

questions.text: The action of 'The Golden Bowl' takes place in Britain and which other country?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	Most of the film takes place in England, but it opens in Rome.

questions.text: Jeremy Northam plays the Principe - what is his character's first name?
questions.explanation:
Amerigo.

	He is supposed to be descended from the Amerigo who gave his name to America

questions.text: What fictional city do the father and daughter, Adam and Maggie Verver, come from?
questions.explanation:
American City.

	American City is a typical new industrial city of the age, built on the proceeds of mining.

questions.text: What is it Adam Verver (Nick Nolte)'s great ambition to build?
questions.explanation:
Art gallery.

	He wants to bring 'something beautiful', European art and culture to his city.

questions.text: Who plays Adam's second wife, Charlotte?
questions.explanation:
Uma Thurman.

	Kate Beckinsale plays his daughter Maggie, and Angelica Huston plays her friend Fanny Assingham.

questions.text: In which provincial city do the adulterous lovers stay over?
questions.explanation:
Gloucester.

	They pretend to have visited the Cathedral but have problems rembering which monuments are there....

questions.text: What is the symbolic characteristic of the Golden Bowl?
questions.explanation:
It is flawed.

	It has a flaw which only some people can see, to others it looks perfect.

questions.text: What happens to the Golden Bowl?
options: It is put in the museum
It is found in the garden
questions.explanation:
It gets broken.

	Fanny breaks it deliberately after it has been the cause of grief to Maggie Verver.
